en_text: Unlock all orbs; Change all orbs to Fire, Water, Wood, and Light orbs; Show path to 3 combos

jp_skill.name: ビクトリーロード
jp_skill.raw_description: 全ドロップのロックを解除し、火、水、木、光ドロップに変化。 3コンボ分のルートを表示（ノーマルダンジョン＆3個消し限定）

kr_skill.name: Victory Road
kr_skill.raw_description: Removes Orb locks, changes Orbs to Fr, Wt, Wd & Lt Orbs; shows 3 combo path (Norm. Dungeon & 3 linked Orbs only)

na_skill.name: Victory Road
na_skill.raw_description: Removes Orb locks, changes Orbs to Fr, Wt, Wd & Lt Orbs; shows 3 combo path (Norm. Dungeon & 3 linked Orbs only)
